instructions: Restart Android device . Hold the Power button until a confirmation menu appears, then tap Shut Down . Once the device has powered down, hold the Power button again to turn it back on, then try reloading Netflix. Make sure anything you have been working on is saved or backed up and at a good stopping point. Clear App Data. If restarting your device doesn't work, you may need to clear your Netflix app data . If you have downloaded any Netflix titles to watch while offline, clearing the data and cache will delete them. You will need to redownload them in order to have offline access again. Try another Wi-Fi network. If neither of the above solutions work, the problem most likely lies with your network. Try Netflix on another Wi-Fi network and see if the problem persists. If switching networks solves the problem with your Netflix app, you'll need to contact your internet service provider for the solution on your regular network. They will most likely walk you through your router settings in order to fix the issue.

Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 1 1 Open Slack on your Android. It s the S icon on a multicolored background. You ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer. Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 2 2 Tap a channel or conversation. You can type a message that spans multiple lines in a chat channel or direct message. To open a channel, tap the team name at the top-left corner of the screen, then tap an option under Channels. To open a message, tap the team name at the top-left corner of the screen, then tap a message under Direct Messages. Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 3 3 Type the first line of your message. Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 4 4 Tap the key on your Android s keyboard. This usually looks like an arrow pointing to the left. The cursor will move to the next line. Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 5 5 Type the next line of your message. Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 6 6 Tap . This opens another line, if you wish to continue. Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 7 7 Type another line. Repeat this process as many times as you wish to type your entire message. Image titled Enter Multiple Lines on Slack on Android Step 8 8 Tap the send button. It s the blue paper airplane at the bottom-right corner of the screen. Your multiple-line message will now appear in the message or conversation. Advertisement
